biotools.summary: Identifies orthologs based on precomputed phylogenetic trees in the PhyloFacts resource. Users may target different taxonomic distances and precision levels by using tree-distance thresholds.

bioschemas.name: PHOG
bioschemas.summary: Identifies orthologs based on precomputed phylogenetic trees in the PhyloFacts resource. Users may target different taxonomic distances and precision levels by using tree-distance thresholds.
